subject: MIGRATION COORDINATION - Roles, Mission, Methods
body:
Team,

## MISSION
Migrate Express BE endpoints to Azure Functions one at a time with full parity validation.

## TEAM ROLES
- **Sarah (Frontend)**: Coordinator, test validation lead, selects endpoints, manages DEVL→TEST→PROD flow
- **Ben (Express BE)**: Provides endpoint contracts, query params, business logic rules, edge cases
- **Fulton (Azure Functions)**: Owns AF implementation, unit tests, confirms readiness

## MIGRATION ORDER
1. GETs first (simplest, read-only)
2. Then DELETEs
3. Then PUTs and POSTs

## METHOD (Per Endpoint)
1. Sarah selects next endpoint from Fulton's ready list
2. Ben provides Express contract if needed
3. Fulton confirms AF deployed to TEST/PROD
4. Sarah validates parity (Express vs AF responses)
5. If PASS → document and proceed to next
6. If FAIL → identify gaps for Fulton to fix
7. After all GETs pass → cutover to AF in PROD

## VALIDATION STATUS
| Endpoint | Status | Records |
|----------|--------|--------|
| Categories GET | ✅ PASSED | 10 identical |
| Roles GET | ✅ PASSED | 5 identical |
| Venues GET | ⏳ Pending | - |
| Organizers GET | ⏳ Pending | - |
| Events GET | ⏳ Pending | - |

## URLs
- Express PROD: calendarbe-prod-a7b3ahe3bteqa6a7.eastus-01.azurewebsites.net
- AF TEST: calendarbeaf-test.azurewebsites.net
- AF PROD: calendarbeaf-prod.azurewebsites.net

## JIRA
Tracking in CALBEAF-63

Proceeding to Venues GET validation now.

- Sarah
